branding.tagline: The Zendesk Block provides comprehensive analytics around customer support and satisfaction

ZENDESK_INSTANCE_DOMAIN.label: Zendesk Instance Domain
ZENDESK_INSTANCE_DOMAIN.description: Domain of your Zendesk instance (i.e. if looker.zendesk.com, then provide 'looker')

ZENDESK_ORGANIZATION_NAME.label: Name of Your company as registered in Zendesk
ZENDESK_ORGANIZATION_NAME.description: Match the name of your organization, as known to your zendesk instance.
